mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ACADEMY_BOARD (ANO, ACADEMYAREA, ACADEMYKIND, ACADEMYPHOTO, ACADEMYTITLE, ACADEMYID, ACADEMYCONTENT, ACADEMYNAME, ACADEMYINTRO, ACADEMYYOUTUBE, ACADEMYTAG) VALUES (SEQ_ACADEMY_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{academyArea}, #{academyKind}, #{academyPhoto}, #{academyTitle}, #{academyId}, #{academyContent}, #{academyName}, #{academyIntro}, #{academyYoutube}, #{academyTag})
